items.name: Basics of C Programming
items.description: A fundamental introduction to the C programming language.

items.name: Data Types and Variables
items.description: Explore various data types in C and learn how to declare and initialize variables.

items.name: Operators and Expressions
items.description: Learn about operators and expressions in C.

items.name: Control Flow
items.description: Explore control flow structures in C.

items.name: Functions and Modular Programming
items.description: Learn about functions and modular programming in C.

items.name: Scope and Storage Classes
items.description: Understand variable scope and storage classes in C.

items.name: Arrays and Pointers
items.description: Learn about arrays and pointers in C.

items.name: Pointers
items.description: Explore the concept of pointers in C.

items.name: Structured Data Types
items.description: Explore structured data types in C, including structures and unions.

items.name: Unions
items.description: Learn about unions in C and their differences from structures.
